name: Benjamin's Thunder
description:
Benjamin Franklin set out with his kite and his son to prove that thunder is indeed electricity.

Now the continent is experiencing unprecedented blackouts. Will you help Benjamin restore elecitricity?

Armed only with an experimental Thunder Kite, and his son's company, the fate of the world is on his shoulders.

Note: Web version made for GodotJam2. For the full experience, download the game!
